question: Aloha All,  I have had Type I Diabetes for the last 28 years and have answers for most questions diabetes related.  Example:  Shaky after lunch - if you exercised over 30 minutes before lunch the calories are still burning in your body for 1-3 hours, give yourself extra fruit, or bread to keep from getting too weak and tired.Will look at others and reply as I can.  Ask for 'CAT' if you want my input.  Thanks. Hope 2 help.
title: Diabetic Support If U Want
